programme.title: The Art and Curse of Television
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on TV war reports since the abolition of front-line censorship.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers the power television has in reflecting the real images of war and peace since the abolition of front-line censorship.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
